history.proof: intros a b p q H. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: plusP_inv1, eqp_eqTerm, ltT_dec.

ctx: intros a b p q H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable s.

ctx: intros a b p q H.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) H : ltT (A:=A) ltM b a Unable to unify "{ltT ?M1744 ?M1746 ?M1747} + {ltT ?M1744 ?M1747 ?M1746} + {eqT ?M1746 ?M1747}" with "eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))) (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))".

ctx: intros a b p q H.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) H : ltT (A:=A) ltM b a Unable to unify "(let (a, a') := ?M1745 in fun H'2 : Term ?M1742 ?M1744 => let (b, b') := H'2 in ?M1743 a b /\\ a' = b') ?M1746" with "eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))) (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))".

original: simpl. intros a b p q H. rewrite <- plusP_inv1 with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q); auto. + apply ltT_dec. + apply eqp_eqTerm.
